channel.title: slack on Tinkering with Linux
channel.description: Recent content in slack on Tinkering with Linux

item.title: Using Slack from the terminal
item.description: In rencent years, lot of my short conversations with my research lab has moved to Slack. I am not a big fan of closed protocol communication clients, but Slack has the advantage that it is relatively easy to use. Well, it seems that it relatively easy to use for everyone except me.
